verses.esv: 33 Do not be deceived: “Bad company ruins good morals.”
verses.kjv: 33 Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.
verses.niv: 33 Do not be misled: "Bad company corrupts good character."

verses.esv: 15 Do not love the world or the things in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
verses.kjv: 15 Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
verses.niv: 15 Do not love the world or anything in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him.

verses.esv:
9   The heart is deceitful above all things,
    and desperately sick;
    who can understand it?
verses.kjv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it?
verses.niv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things and beyond cure. Who can understand it?

verses.esv: 14 And no wonder, for even Satan disguises himself as an angel of light.
verses.kjv: 14 And no marvel; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light.
verses.niv: 14 And no wonder, for Satan himself masquerades as an angel of light.

verses.esv: 8 But as for the cowardly, the faithless, the detestable, as for murderers, the sexually immoral, sorcerers, idolaters, and all liars, their portion will be in the lake that burns with fire and sulfur, which is the second death.”
verses.kjv: 8 But the fearful, and unbelieving, and the abominable, and murderers, and whoremongers, and sorcerers, and idolaters, and all liars, shall have their part in the lake which burneth with fire and brimstone: which is the second death.
verses.niv: 8 But the cowardly, the unbelieving, the vile, the murderers, the sexually immoral, those who practice magic arts, the idolaters and all liars--their place will be in the fiery lake of burning sulfur. This is the second death."

verses.esv: 4 He will wipe away every tear from their eyes, and death shall be no more, neither shall there be mourning, nor crying, nor pain anymore, for the former things have passed away.”
verses.kjv: 4 And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
verses.niv: 4 He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away."

verses.esv: 15 “Beware of false prophets, who come to you in sheep’s clothing but inwardly are ravenous wolves.
verses.kjv: 15 Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep’s clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.
verses.niv: 15 "Watch out for false prophets. They come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ferocious wolves.

verses.esv: 6 “Do not give dogs what is holy, and do not throw your pearls before pigs, lest they trample them underfoot and turn to attack you.
verses.kjv: 6 Give not that which is holy unto the dogs, neither cast ye your pearls before swine, lest they trample them under their feet, and turn again and rend you.
verses.niv: 6 "Do not give dogs what is sacred; do not throw your pearls to pigs. If you do, they may trample them under their feet, and then turn and tear you to pieces.

verses.esv:
17   O LORD, you hear the desire of the afflicted;
    you will strengthen their heart; you will incline your ear
verses.kjv: 17 LORD, thou hast heard the desire of the humble: thou wilt prepare their heart, thou wilt cause thine ear to hear:
verses.niv: 17 You hear, O LORD, the desire of the afflicted; you encourage them, and you listen to their cry,

verses.esv: 44 You are of your father the devil, and your will is to do your father’s desires. He was a murderer from the beginning, and does not stand in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he lies, he speaks out of his own character, for he is a liar and the father of lies.
verses.kjv: 44 Ye are of your father the devil, and the lusts of your father ye will do. He was a murderer from the beginning, and abode not in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he speaketh a lie, he speaketh of his own: for he is a liar, and the father of it.
verses.niv: 44 You belong to your father, the devil, and you want to carry out your father's desire. He was a murderer from the beginning, not holding to the truth, for there is no truth in him. When he lies, he speaks his native language, for he is a liar and the father of lies.

verses.esv:
7   His mouth is filled with cursing and deceit and oppression;
    under his tongue are mischief and iniquity.
verses.kjv: 7 His mouth is full of cursing and deceit and fraud: under his tongue is mischief and vanity.
verses.niv: 7 His mouth is full of curses and lies and threats; trouble and evil are under his tongue.

verses.esv: 19 Beloved, never avenge yourselves, but leave it to the wrath of God, for it is written, “Vengeance is mine, I will repay, says the Lord.”
verses.kjv: 19 Dearly beloved, avenge not yourselves, but rather give place unto wrath: for it is written, Vengeance is mine; I will repay, saith the Lord.
verses.niv: 19 Do not take revenge, my friends, but leave room for God's wrath, for it is written: "It is mine to avenge; I will repay," says the Lord.

verses.esv:
61:1   The Spirit of the Lord GOD is upon me,
    because the LORD has anointed me
  to bring good news to the poor;
    he has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted,
  to proclaim liberty to the captives,
    and the opening of the prison to those who are bound;
verses.kjv: 1 The Spirit of the Lord GOD is upon me; because the LORD hath anointed me to preach good tidings unto the meek; he hath sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound;
verses.niv: 1 The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to preach good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners,

verses.esv:
9   A false witness will not go unpunished,
    and he who breathes out lies will perish.
verses.kjv: 9 A false witness shall not be unpunished, and he that speaketh lies shall perish.
verses.niv: 9 A false witness will not go unpunished, and he who pours out lies will perish.

verses.esv:
5   For his anger is but for a moment,
    and his favor is for a lifetime.
  Weeping may tarry for the night,
    but joy comes with the morning.
verses.kjv: 5 For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
verses.niv: 5 For his anger lasts only a moment, but his favor lasts a lifetime; weeping may remain for a night, but rejoicing comes in the morning.

verses.esv:
3   May the LORD cut off all flattering lips,
    the tongue that makes great boasts,
verses.kjv: 3 The LORD shall cut off all flattering lips, and the tongue that speaketh proud things:
verses.niv: 3 May the LORD cut off all flattering lips and every boastful tongue

verses.esv:
9   For there is no truth in their mouth;
    their inmost self is destruction;
  their throat is an open grave;
    they flatter with their tongue.
verses.kjv: 9 For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; their inward part is very wickedness; their throat is an open sepulchre; they flatter with their tongue.
verses.niv: 9 Not a word from their mouth can be trusted; their heart is filled with destruction. Their throat is an open grave; with their tongue they speak deceit.

verses.esv:
12   “Though evil is sweet in his mouth,
    though he hides it under his tongue,
verses.kjv: 12 Though wickedness be sweet in his mouth, though he hide it under his tongue;
verses.niv: 12 "Though evil is sweet in his mouth and he hides it under his tongue,

verses.esv:
3   For he will deliver you from the snare of the fowler
    and from the deadly pestilence.
verses.kjv: 3 Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.
verses.niv: 3 Surely he will save you from the fowler's snare and from the deadly pestilence.

verses.esv:
13   Keep your tongue from evil
    and your lips from speaking deceit.
verses.kjv: 13 Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.
verses.niv: 13 keep your tongue from evil and your lips from speaking lies.
